texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: author: Major Hayden date: '2023-09-04' summary: > If you love to nerd out on just about anything, give it a try the next time you buy a car. tags:
texts.text: author: Major Hayden date: '2023-09-04' summary: > If you love to nerd out on just about anything, give it a try the next time you buy a car. tags:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: advice
texts.text: advice

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: finance
texts.text: finance

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I love optimizing nearly everything in my life. Sometimes it means saving money. Other times it means squeezing every bit of performance out of a server.
texts.text: I love optimizing nearly everything in my life. Sometimes it means saving money. Other times it means squeezing every bit of performance out of a server.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: But let's try optimizing something I've never done on this blog before: Buying a car.
texts.text: But let's try optimizing something I've never done on this blog before: Buying a car.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Although most of this information applies best to people in the USA, there are several things I've learned over the years that might benefit people in other places. Car purchases are often the second largest purchase for most Americans after buying a house. Why not optimize it as much as possible?
texts.text: Although most of this information applies best to people in the USA, there are several things I've learned over the years that might benefit people in other places. Car purchases are often the second largest purchase for most Americans after buying a house. Why not optimize it as much as possible?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: My family is in the market for new vehicle and I've immersed myself in learning more about the whole process. There are plenty of legal issues in play that many buyers don't know about and there are tons of ways to walk into a dealership fully prepared.
texts.text: My family is in the market for new vehicle and I've immersed myself in learning more about the whole process. There are plenty of legal issues in play that many buyers don't know about and there are tons of ways to walk into a dealership fully prepared.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Without further ado, I'll share what I've learned with you!
texts.text: Without further ado, I'll share what I've learned with you!

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Shopping
texts.text: Shopping

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Shopping and buying are two different things. You must keep them separate. If you're not sure on the exact model of car you want, go shopping and don't commit to buy anything.
texts.text: Shopping and buying are two different things. You must keep them separate. If you're not sure on the exact model of car you want, go shopping and don't commit to buy anything.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you have an idea of a particular car you want, go to Google and search for 5-10 competitors to that car. It's as easy as searching "top competitors Camry" to find other cars that compete with a Toyota Camry. Go to those dealers and take a good look at the cars to see if they have the features you want. Test drive each and see if you still like them.
texts.text: If you have an idea of a particular car you want, go to Google and search for 5-10 competitors to that car. It's as easy as searching "top competitors Camry" to find other cars that compete with a Toyota Camry. Go to those dealers and take a good look at the cars to see if they have the features you want. Test drive each and see if you still like them.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: The really important thing here is to separate  shopping  from  buying .
texts.text: The really important thing here is to separate  shopping  from  buying .

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Search for prices
texts.text: Search for prices

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Once you narrow your search down a bit, start to compare prices between dealers for different trim levels. I love using  CarEdge  for this since you can examine dealer inventory across the country and see how dealer prices stack up against each other.
texts.text: Once you narrow your search down a bit, start to compare prices between dealers for different trim levels. I love using  CarEdge  for this since you can examine dealer inventory across the country and see how dealer prices stack up against each other.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Also check how long the vehicle has been sitting on the lot. CarEdge offers this data and it can give you an idea of how desperate a dealer is to get rid of a particular vehicle. If the total supply of a model is really high and the vehicle has been sitting on the lot longer than 90 days, you have the ability to negotiate for that car. Cars with a very low supply or cars that just arrived to the lot will likely be priced higher and dealers are less likely to budge on price.
texts.text: Also check how long the vehicle has been sitting on the lot. CarEdge offers this data and it can give you an idea of how desperate a dealer is to get rid of a particular vehicle. If the total supply of a model is really high and the vehicle has been sitting on the lot longer than 90 days, you have the ability to negotiate for that car. Cars with a very low supply or cars that just arrived to the lot will likely be priced higher and dealers are less likely to budge on price.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: For used cars, this is even more important since you don't have an MSRP to work with as you do for new cars. Comparing prices for used cars is critical.
texts.text: For used cars, this is even more important since you don't have an MSRP to work with as you do for new cars. Comparing prices for used cars is critical.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Keep in mind that some cars are in higher demand in some areas than others, too. You might be able to drive a few hours and save quite a bit. A friend of mine drove from Texas to Colorado to buy a car and saved $3,500.
texts.text: Keep in mind that some cars are in higher demand in some areas than others, too. You might be able to drive a few hours and save quite a bit. A friend of mine drove from Texas to Colorado to buy a car and saved $3,500.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Watch out for arbitrary markups! All dealers in the US are required to display a Monroney label and this shows the manufacturer's suggested retail price. Dealers might add an addendum sticker somewhere else that show accessories they added. Sometimes these stickers show arbitrary markups from the dealer.
texts.text: Watch out for arbitrary markups! All dealers in the US are required to display a Monroney label and this shows the manufacturer's suggested retail price. Dealers might add an addendum sticker somewhere else that show accessories they added. Sometimes these stickers show arbitrary markups from the dealer.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Since COVID, many dealers have been stacking massive fees on top of car purchases. Some of these fees exceed $10,000, $25,000 or more! This should be a massive red flag from the start of a negotiation with any dealer. If they aren't willing to budge from their arbitrary markups, look for another dealer. 🚩
texts.text: Since COVID, many dealers have been stacking massive fees on top of car purchases. Some of these fees exceed $10,000, $25,000 or more! This should be a massive red flag from the start of a negotiation with any dealer. If they aren't willing to budge from their arbitrary markups, look for another dealer. 🚩

texts.label: title
texts.orig: You found the car you want
texts.text: You found the car you want

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Awesome! 🥳
texts.text: Awesome! 🥳

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Whether it's new or used, take the VIN number and dig up information about the car. You can learn a lot from just a quick Google search from the VIN!
texts.text: Whether it's new or used, take the VIN number and dig up information about the car. You can learn a lot from just a quick Google search from the VIN!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Other than that, CarEdge has some good tools for digging up data on individual cars without too much expense. CarFax is the gold standard used and it offers some fairly inexpensive options.
texts.text: Other than that, CarEdge has some good tools for digging up data on individual cars without too much expense. CarFax is the gold standard used and it offers some fairly inexpensive options.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Some might be saying:  "Isn't this a waste for a brand new car?" No, it's not.
texts.text: Some might be saying:  "Isn't this a waste for a brand new car?" No, it's not.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I was once buying a pickup truck that was advertised as one model year, but the truck was actually a year older. The dealer even switched the paper tags attached to the keys so I wouldn't notice. I didn't notice this until months later when I found it buried in my paperwork. 😡
texts.text: I was once buying a pickup truck that was advertised as one model year, but the truck was actually a year older. The dealer even switched the paper tags attached to the keys so I wouldn't notice. I didn't notice this until months later when I found it buried in my paperwork. 😡

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: There have also been situations where  stolen cars  are sitting on dealer lots. 😱
texts.text: There have also been situations where  stolen cars  are sitting on dealer lots. 😱

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Remember, this is a big investment. Spending $20 on a CarFax report as you purchase a $30,000 car should be worth it.
texts.text: Remember, this is a big investment. Spending $20 on a CarFax report as you purchase a $30,000 car should be worth it.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Financing
texts.text: Financing

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Take care of your financing  before visiting a dealer. Local credit unions are often great for this but they've been under a squeeze lately with an increase in reposessions. Work with the credit union to get a good rate for the type of car you want.
texts.text: Take care of your financing  before visiting a dealer. Local credit unions are often great for this but they've been under a squeeze lately with an increase in reposessions. Work with the credit union to get a good rate for the type of car you want.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Some people have had good luck financing through a dealership. However, getting financing set up ahead of time gives you the upper hand with financing negotiations. For example, when you sit down with in the finance office, you could say:  "I have 5.9% through my local credit union. If you can beat that, I'll finance with you."
texts.text: Some people have had good luck financing through a dealership. However, getting financing set up ahead of time gives you the upper hand with financing negotiations. For example, when you sit down with in the finance office, you could say:  "I have 5.9% through my local credit union. If you can beat that, I'll finance with you."

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If you choose to go through financing with the dealer, here's what I recommend:
texts.text: If you choose to go through financing with the dealer, here's what I recommend:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Do not allow the dealer to run your credit report until the last minute.'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Do not allow the dealer to run your credit report until the last minute.'>]

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: Ask to see the "call sheet" and see what the bank offered the dealer for financing (the "buy rate").
texts.text: Ask to see the "call sheet" and see what the bank offered the dealer for financing (the "buy rate").

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: If the dealer says they can lower your interest rate if you buy an add-on from them, such as extended warranty,
texts.text: If the dealer says they can lower your interest rate if you buy an add-on from them, such as extended warranty,

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You are not required to buy any of the add-ons that the finance manager offers you.
texts.text: You are not required to buy any of the add-ons that the finance manager offers you.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You are required to pay reasonable fees for tax, title, and license.
texts.text: You are required to pay reasonable fees for tax, title, and license.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: [<RawText children='Demand to see the "out the door price."'>]
texts.text: [<RawText children='Demand to see the "out the door price."'>]

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Dealers make the most money by far not on the lot itself, but in the finance office. Don't get swindled there.
texts.text: Dealers make the most money by far not on the lot itself, but in the finance office. Don't get swindled there.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Get copies and read them
texts.text: Get copies and read them

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: You are entitled to a copy of everything that shows up in the finance office. Don't get up from the chair until you have a copy of everything and you've examined each page.
texts.text: You are entitled to a copy of everything that shows up in the finance office. Don't get up from the chair until you have a copy of everything and you've examined each page.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Dealers commonly adjust numbers or conveniently leave out "We Owe" sheets (see the next section) in the finance office. Sometimes it's an honest mistake. Sometimes it's not.
texts.text: Dealers commonly adjust numbers or conveniently leave out "We Owe" sheets (see the next section) in the finance office. Sometimes it's an honest mistake. Sometimes it's not.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: The dreaded "We Owe"
texts.text: The dreaded "We Owe"

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If a dealer doesn't have something in stock that they promised you, such as an accessory or add-on, ensure it lands on the "We Owe" sheet in your paperwork.
texts.text: If a dealer doesn't have something in stock that they promised you, such as an accessory or add-on, ensure it lands on the "We Owe" sheet in your paperwork.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: There should be page somewhere in your sale paperwork that shows anything that the dealer owes you. In many states, this sheet  must  be in your paperwork even if it's blank or zeroed out!
texts.text: There should be page somewhere in your sale paperwork that shows anything that the dealer owes you. In many states, this sheet  must  be in your paperwork even if it's blank or zeroed out!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If a dealer promised you something and it didn't land on the "We Owe" sheet, stop immediately and ask for that to be corrected right then.
texts.text: If a dealer promised you something and it didn't land on the "We Owe" sheet, stop immediately and ask for that to be corrected right then.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Trade-ins
texts.text: Trade-ins

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Any time you trade in a vehicle,  make it a different transaction. Allowing a dealer to add your trade-in with the current deal for purchase allows them to hide money for themselves in the deal.
texts.text: Any time you trade in a vehicle,  make it a different transaction. Allowing a dealer to add your trade-in with the current deal for purchase allows them to hide money for themselves in the deal.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: First, get multiple offers from various sites that buy cars all day long. I recommend Carvana, Driveway, and Vroom. They will give you an immediate estimate online with a little bit of information. The CarEdge site I mentioned earlier also has some tools that allow you to look up your car in the Black Book, which is what dealers use to appraise cars.
texts.text: First, get multiple offers from various sites that buy cars all day long. I recommend Carvana, Driveway, and Vroom. They will give you an immediate estimate online with a little bit of information. The CarEdge site I mentioned earlier also has some tools that allow you to look up your car in the Black Book, which is what dealers use to appraise cars.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Next, when you go to the dealer and they ask if you're trading in a car, tell them you haven't decided yet. Your best bet is to act as if you want them to talk you into it. Either way,  keep the trade-in as a separate transaction.
texts.text: Next, when you go to the dealer and they ask if you're trading in a car, tell them you haven't decided yet. Your best bet is to act as if you want them to talk you into it. Either way,  keep the trade-in as a separate transaction.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: When it comes time to talk about your trade-in, you should already have an out the door price on your car purchase. Scroll up if you're not sure about this.  😉
texts.text: When it comes time to talk about your trade-in, you should already have an out the door price on your car purchase. Scroll up if you're not sure about this.  😉

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let the dealer know you have some other offers on your trade and let them know you'll do the trade there if they can beat the offers. If they offer to beat the other deals, that's awesome! That's less work for you!
texts.text: Let the dealer know you have some other offers on your trade and let them know you'll do the trade there if they can beat the offers. If they offer to beat the other deals, that's awesome! That's less work for you!

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If they can't, don't worry. You can handle the trade-in separately with those other companies.
texts.text: If they can't, don't worry. You can handle the trade-in separately with those other companies.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Buying online
texts.text: Buying online

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Finally, you can buy a car almost entirely online these days. Carvana, Driveway, and Vroom offer a fully online experience, but traditional dealers often have salespeople focused on internet deals.
texts.text: Finally, you can buy a car almost entirely online these days. Carvana, Driveway, and Vroom offer a fully online experience, but traditional dealers often have salespeople focused on internet deals.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: This is a good way to sort out dealers who want to work with you and those that don't. Let dealers know that:
texts.text: This is a good way to sort out dealers who want to work with you and those that don't. Let dealers know that:

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You know what vehicle you want.
texts.text: You know what vehicle you want.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You're comparing the offers from multiple dealers.
texts.text: You're comparing the offers from multiple dealers.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You're looking to purchase within the next few weeks.
texts.text: You're looking to purchase within the next few weeks.

texts.label: list_item
texts.orig: You want an out the door price on the vehicle so you know how much to get on the cashier's check.
texts.text: You want an out the door price on the vehicle so you know how much to get on the cashier's check.

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: If they're willing to deal with you via email or phone, that's great! If not, there's plenty of other dealers out there.
texts.text: If they're willing to deal with you via email or phone, that's great! If not, there's plenty of other dealers out there.

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Further learning
texts.text: Further learning

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: I've learned a lot from several YouTube channels over the years. Here are my favorites:
texts.text: I've learned a lot from several YouTube channels over the years. Here are my favorites:

texts.label: title
texts.orig: Did I miss something?
texts.text: Did I miss something?

texts.label: paragraph
texts.orig: Let me know if I missed something and I'll come back and edit this post! Just contact me via any of the methods below in the author block. ️⬇️
texts.text: Let me know if I missed something and I'll come back and edit this post! Just contact me via any of the methods below in the author block. ️⬇️
